post_title: FS: T206 Old Mill Cobb Red Portrait PSA 2.5
post_content:
$5610 net; I cover shipping.

T206 Bat Off Polar Bear or Colgan Cobb
W519 or 33 Goudey Ruth (53, 144)

J=K Type 2

Friday bump. Red portrait priced at $5500 shipped.
